ygData.subject: Can I have PoD staff?
ygData.messageBody:
<<
Newbie: Why is the PoD running around?
Kiter: We're kiting him.
Newbie: What's kiting?
Kiter: We run out of attack range while hitting him with spells.
Newbie: Why u kill PoD?
Kiter: For the loot he carries.
Newbie: What does PoD drop?
Kiter: A really crappy staff.
Newbie: Can I have PoD staff?
[pause]
Newbie: Can I have PoD staff?
[pause]
Newbie: Can I have PoD staff?

This is usually the level of stupidity high level folks are
ranting about when they mutter "stupid lower levels." I
seriously doubt anyone capable of subscribing themselves to
this list would fall into that category.>>



Can I have PoD staff?
[waits for reply]
Can I have PoD staff?
[waits for reply]
Can I have PoD staff?
[waits for reply]
Please?
[ducks]
hehe j/k

Catnip Silkenpaws
